import './booking.css' import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap' import { useState } from 'react' const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {price, reviews} = tour const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userId: '01', userEmail: 'example@gmail.com', fullname: '', phone: '', bookAt: '', guestSize: 1 }) const handleChange = (e) => { setCredentials(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.id]: e.target.value })) } return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {reviews?.length}
Information
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service charge
$10
Total
$109
) } export default Booking
